title: Form Priority and Conflict Resolution Rules
description: These rules handle cases where multiple form keywords appear in the title or when specific combinations need special handling.

rules.description: Cough drops or throat drops are always lozenges
rules.condition: If title contains 'cough drop' OR 'throat drop'
rules.reason: These terms always indicate lozenge form, regardless of other keywords

rules.description: Powder IN capsules means capsule form, not powder
rules.reason: Powder describes the ingredient state, capsule is the delivery form

rules.description: Upgrade generic capsule to vegetable capsule if specified
rules.condition: If title contains 'vegetable capsule' or 'veg capsule' or similar variants
rules.action: Set form to VEGETABLE CAPSULE (not just CAPSULE)
rules.reason: Be specific when the product explicitly mentions vegetable/vegan/vegetarian capsules

rules.description: Gel capsules or liquid capsules are softgels
rules.condition: If title contains 'gel capsule' OR 'liquid capsule'
rules.reason: These terms specifically indicate softgel form, not hard capsules

rules.condition: If title contains 'chew tablet' or 'chewable tablet'
rules.action: Set form to CHEWABLE TABLET (not TABLET)
rules.reason: Distinguish chewable from regular swallow tablets

client_instructions: To add a new rule, add an entry with the next rule_id (FORM-RULE-06, etc.). Include: condition (when to apply), action (what to do), and reason (why this rule exists).
